page.text: This parameter sets the background color of the generated code image.
Use this parameter to customize the background color of the generated image. It supports formats like HEX (e.g., #FFFFFF) and RGBA (e.g., rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)).
page.syntax-highlight:
import requests
api_url = "https://bloom-bony-philodendron.glitch.me/cook?code=console.log(%22Hello%20world%22)&backgroundColor=#ccccc" response = requests.get(api_url)
if response.status_code == 200: image_path = "output.png" with open(image_path, "wb") as file: file.write(response.content)
print("Image saved as output.png") else: print("Failed to fetch the image")
